issue.title: Splitwise Clone
issue.body:
## Overview
Simple expense-sharing app.

## Features
- Google OAuth login
- Create groups
- Add expenses (split equally)
- View balances

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 App Router
- Tailwind + shadcn/ui
- SQLite (better-sqlite3)
- NextAuth.js

## Pages
- Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail
